mapper.select: select product.spu_code as spuCode, product.goods_name as goodsName, product.goods_image as goodsImage, product.brand_name as brandName, product.supplier_name as supplierName from product_topic inner join product on product_topic.spu_code=product.spu_code where topic_id = #{topicId} order by product_topic.sort_num ASC, product_topic.id ASC

update.foreach: update product_topic set sort_num=#{index} where topic_id=#{topicId} and spu_code=#{spuCode}
